sources.title: Iona | Full Movie | Award Winning Drama | Ruth Negga | Douglas Henshall
sources.description:
Having left an island community as a damaged teenager, a woman returns home with a secret and her own troubled adolescent son.
2015.  Stars: Ruth Negga, Douglas Henshall, Tom Brooke

metadata.Plot: Iona takes her teenage son to the holy island where she was born so they can hide from a violent crime. As her son seeks forgiveness for what he has done Iona comes to terms with her loss of faith.
metadata.Actors: Ruth Negga, Douglas Henshall, Tom Brooke
